portal.pledges1: 1„ÄÅEmbrace FollowFi's core values in every part of our lives: Discipline,Unity,Courage,and Effort.
portal.pledges2: 2„ÄÅSecure our wallets,keep handwritten mnemonic records,and avoid connecting wallets to sketchy dApps.
portal.pledges3: 3„ÄÅStay ahead with the latest tech trends,learn continuously,and share insights generously.
portal.pledges4: 4„ÄÅGrow our wealth by consistently acquiring valuable assets and using smart compounding.
portal.pledges5: 5„ÄÅPlan wisely,spend and invest with reason,cut unnecessary costs,and prioritize health.
portal.pledges6: 6„ÄÅUphold fairness, reject unjust actions, and oppose those who try to go against this principle.
portal.pledges7: 7„ÄÅPool resources for significant investments aiming for higher returns.
portal.pledges8: 8„ÄÅStand by to support one another whenever challenges arise.
portal.pledges9: 9„ÄÅUnite to address any discipline issues within our communities.
portal.pledges10: 10„ÄÅIntroduce physical activities in all communities and actively join social events.
